amendment.description: Amendment sought to add $200 million to provide 32,000 section 8 housing vouchers and add $105 million for the public housing operating fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide $200 million for 32,000 Section 8 housing vouchers and $105 million for the public housing operating fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 267 (Roll no. 393).
